page.title: 06THE POLICE AND THE PUBLIC
page.content: The Police are satisfied with their relationship with the public.Public support is good and there is little serious crime.It is believed that a lot of police work is too impersonal and that the "bobby on the beat" system has much going for it.However, car patrols are quicker.The Police are concerned with the behaviour of youngsters. 80% of all crime in our area is committed by youths under 18.Shop-lifting and assault are linked with this age group.Under-age drinking is also a cause for concern.The Police recently launched a Good Neighbour Crime Watch scheme in the area.The idea is to prevent crime rather than have to solve it.
